value.fullName: I am requesting that my school provide equipment and will complete any additional steps (grades 9-12) necessary to confirm that I qualify to receive equipment.
value.label: I am requesting that my school provide equipment and will complete any additional steps (grades 9-12) necessary to confirm that I qualify to receive equipment.

value.fullName: I am requesting that my school provide equipment and will complete any additional steps (grades K-5 only) necessary to confirm that I qualify to receive equipment.
value.label: I am requesting that my school provide equipment and will complete any additional steps (grades K-5 only) necessary to confirm that I qualify to receive equipment.

value.fullName: I will use my own equipment in order to help my school fund other programs.
value.label: I will use my own equipment in order to help my school fund other programs.
